title: Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description: When editing the XML in the "source" view of the Layout Editor and then attempting to switch back to the Layout view, an error message stating that the changes need to be saved is displayed. Currently, the user has to figure out how to save or discard the changes, which is not intuitive. The error message itself is not very informative as it simply says "Source page is dirty." Additionally, the dialog box for saving changes is titled "Error".
OB: If you edit the XML in the "source" view of the Layout Editor and then switch to the Layout view, you will encounter an error message indicating that the changes need to be saved. Currently, it is unclear to the user how they can save or discard the changes, and the error message lacks helpful information. The error message is: "Source page is dirty.".
